## blockRendering.PathObject class

An object that handles creating and setting each of the SVG elements used by the renderer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class PathObject implements IPathObject 
```
**Implements:** [IPathObject](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.md)

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(root, style, constants)](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>PathObject</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addConnectionHighlight(connection, connectionPath, offset, rtl)](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.addconnectionhighlight.md) |  | Adds the given path as a connection highlight for the given connection. |
|  [applyColour(block)](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.applycolour.md) |  | Apply the stored colours to the block's path, taking into account whether the paths belong to a shadow block. |
|  [flipRTL()](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.fliprtl.md) |  | Flip the SVG paths in RTL. |
|  [removeConnectionHighlight(connection)](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.removeconnectionhighlight.md) |  | Removes any highlight associated with the given connection, if it exists. |
|  [setClass\_(className, add)](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.setclass_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Add or remove the given CSS class on the path object's root SVG element. |
|  [setPath(pathString)](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.setpath.md) |  | Set the path generated by the renderer onto the respective SVG element. |
|  [setStyle(blockStyle)](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.setstyle.md) |  | Set the style. |
|  [updateDisabled\_(disabled)](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.updatedisabled_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Updates the look of the block to reflect a disabled state. |
|  [updateDraggingDelete(enable)](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.updatedraggingdelete.md) |  | Add or remove styling showing that a block is dragged over a delete area. |
|  [updateHighlighted(enable)](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.updatehighlighted.md) |  | Set whether the block shows a highlight or not. Block highlighting is often used to visually mark blocks currently being executed. |
|  [updateInsertionMarker(enable)](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.updateinsertionmarker.md) |  | Add or remove styling showing that a block is an insertion marker. |
|  [updateMovable(enable)](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.updatemovable.md) |  | Add or remove styling showing that a block is movable. |
|  [updateReplacementFade(enable)](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.updatereplacementfade.md) |  | Add or remove styling that shows that if the dragging block is dropped, this block will be replaced. If a shadow block, it will disappear. Otherwise it will bump. |
|  [updateSelected(enable)](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.updateselected.md) |  | Add or remove styling showing that a block is selected. |
|  [updateShadow\_(shadow)](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.updateshadow_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Updates the look of the block to reflect a shadow state. |
|  [updateShapeForInputHighlight(\_conn, \_enable)](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.updateshapeforinputhighlight.md) |  | Add or remove styling that shows that if the dragging block is dropped, this block will be connected to the input. |
